name: Couscous Risotto
keywords: broth, couscous, spices, dairy-free, nut-free, side dish
recipeIngredient: 10 medium-size garlic cloves, smashed, peeled and minced
3 tablespoons ground cumin, preferably freshly ground
4 cups chicken broth or vegetarian broth (see Micro-Tip)

recipeInstructions.text: Place oil in a 14- by 9- by 2-inch oval dish. Cook, uncovered, at 100 percent in a high-power oven for 2 minutes. Stir in onion and garlic. Cook for 2 minutes. Stir in spices and cook for 3 minutes.
Stir in couscous and pour broth over mixture. Cook for 10 minutes.
Remove from oven. Stir in salt and pepper.
